item.description:
It's a holiday Monday (Robert, that's President's Day) and this time I remembered. It's potluck at my house so bring something yummy and remember we start early so we have time to eat first.

Be sure to RSVP and I will send directions the day before.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email directions the day before

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group
